title: Blended Problem-Based Mathematics Instruction for 21st-Century Competencies

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic mathematical concepts (equations, functions, geometry) and fundamental proficiency in digital learning tools
context.additional_context: Integration of cultural contexts applying Indonesian traditional mathematical knowledge to modern problem-solving; enhanced small-group activities using real-time collaboration tools

learning_goals: Students improve critical thinking skills by over 15% while solving real-world problems (population distribution, traditional architectural design, etc.) through mathematical modeling
Clearly communicate mathematical ideas via team-based PBL tasks and achieve peer evaluation scores of 4 or higher (5-point scale)
Combine ethnic science knowledge with digital tools (GeoGebra, Padlet) to propose at least three creative problem-solving solutions per learner

resources: Indonesian Traditional Mathematics Case Study Video Resources

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
